original_text: And on the seventh day he shall shave off all his hair from his head, his beard, and his eyebrows. He shall shave off all his hair, and then he shall wash his clothes and bathe his body in water, and he shall be clean.
korean_text: 일곱째 날에 그는 모든 털을 밀되 머리털과 수염과 눈썹을 다 밀고 그의 옷을 빨고 몸을 물에 씻을 것이라 그리하면 정하리라

sentences.original_text: he shall shave off all his hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 머리의 모든 털을 밀어야 할지니

sentences.original_text: from his head, his beard, and his eyebrows
He shall shave off all his hair
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자기 모든 털을 밀어야 할지니

sentences.original_text: and then he shall wash his clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그는 자기 옷을 빨아야 할지니

sentences.original_text: and bathe his body in water
